content: resting place photo provided by ruth bowden *¨`* ☠ *¨`* ………… wishing you the skull iest day ever ☠ ✿ *☠`* ¯`v´¯ ☠ ¯`v´¯ *☠`* ✿ ✿ *☠`* ¸ ¯`v´¯ ¸ ´*☠`* ✿ ………… … ¸ ´ … ………… size 10 thread 6 us / 1 75 mm hook - makes a 4 inch diameter coaster stitch guide - sts st- stitches stitch - chain chain stitch - slip st slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet - double_crochet --double_crochet - treble_crochet -triple crochet - two double_crochet together 2dctog -yarn over insert the hook into the next stitch yarn over draw the yarn through the stitch yarn over draw the yarn through 2 loops on the hook yarn over insert hook in same space yarn over draw the yarn through the 2 loops yarn over draw the yarn through the 3 remaining loops on the hook - back post double_crochet bpdc yarn over insert hook back to front around post of st indicated yarn over and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yarn over and draw through 2 loops on hook twice row 1 ch10 half_double_crochet in 4th chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 6st ch2 turn 7 half_double_crochet ​ row2 double_crochet in same st ch1 skip next st double_crochet in next st ch1 skip next st double_crochet in next st ch1 skip next st 2dctog in next st ch3 turn row 3 double_crochet in same st as turning ch1 skip next chain space double_crochet in next st ch1 skip next chain space double_crochet in next st ch1 skip next chain space 2dctog in next st ch3 turn round 4 double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in next same as turning single_crochet across next 5st / chain space single_crochet half_double_crochet 2dc in next st ch1 turn row 4>> row 5>> row 5 single_crochet across next 5st ch3 skip st single_crochet across next 5 st ch2 turn 2 row 6 double_crochet in same space as turning ch5 skip next 4sts half_double_crochet in chain space ch5 skip next 5sts 2dctog in next st ch1 turn row 7 single_crochet in same space as turning 5sc in each of next 2 chain sps single_crochet in next st ch2 turn row 8 2dc-decrease over next 2 sts 5 times double_crochet in next st ch2 turn row 9 half_double_crochet in each of next 4 sts ch2 slip_stitch into next st do not turn 3 round 10 do not work this row too tight ​ ​ ch8 treble_crochet in 5th chain from hook working to your left double_crochet in top of st from row 7 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made double_crochet in top of st of row 5 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made treble_crochet in top of st from row 2 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made double_crochet in first chain space of row 1 this will be the ​ beg chain from row 1 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made skip next 3 chain space / st
